There will be no shortage of "market crash incoming" and people waiting on the
sidelines because of the crash scare.

localize.title: 标普500指数将在十年结束前达到10000点
localize.the_new_excerpt:

听起来哦，很聪明。

将不乏 "市场崩盘来袭 "的说法，人们在等待着
旁观者，因为崩盘的恐慌。
